<p><i>Note to Secretary Stanton. Washington. November 11, <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1863">1863</a></i></p>

<p>Dear Sir, I personally wish Jacob Freese, of New Jersey, to be appointed Colonel of a coloured regiment, and this regardless of whether he can tell the exact shade of Julius C&aelig;sar's hair.</p>

<p>[<a href="/results.php?tla=abl" rel="me">A. LINCOLN</a>]</p>
